Author: Dirkjan Ochtman
Comment: Heh, you mirror my thoughts: <http://twitter.com/djco/status/3162385438>. There’s a thread in GReader support forums about adding support for authenticated feeds, maybe you could add your thoughts there?

Author: Nate
Comment: Not sure if this is still an issue for you or not, but Google Reader supposedly has an undocumented API. Simply do a search for “Google Reader API”. I haven’t researched this much myself.

Author: Phil
Comment: Yes indeed, and I’ve even used it, but an actual, documented API with client libraries (like the other Google apps) would be very welcome.
